explains: adj. 虔诚的，祷告的；信仰的；献身的

sentences.en: I was writing's most devotional handmaiden.
sentences.cn: 我是写作的最热心的侍仆。

sentences.en: I have used it as devotional reading after my morning prayer.
sentences.cn: 在每天晨祷后，我将它视为祷告的读物。

sentences.en: Today’s guest devotional is by Jon Walker, author of ‘Growing with Purpose.’
sentences.cn: 今天的祷告嘉宾是乔恩·沃克，他是“有追求地生活”一文的作者。
